status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"31grg","text":"Seed Hela cells into 150 mm dishes at a density of 1.9 million cells.  The cells will be near confluent in 2 days.  Otherwise seeding 4x106 of cells/150 mm dish will be near confluent the next day.  Expect to get 3-  of protein per dish.  These numbers will be different for other cell lines and will have to be determined prior to the experiment. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":138,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":215,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":5}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2h14e","text":"Turn on the centrifuge, install rotor for 1.5 ml tubes and chill to  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":68,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"279qt","text":"To 1% Triton X100 lysis buffer add Roche Complete Mini, EDTA-free protease inhibitor (1 tablet/10 ml) and Roche PhosSTOP phosphatase inhibitor (1 tablet/10 ml).  Allow to dissolve, vortexing occasionally. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2jrt9","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ei0ji","text":"Adjust pH to  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":13,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f1d77","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["179",100],"data":[["1% Triton X-100 Buffer:","Amount/Liter\n"],["Tris, 50 mM","6.057 g"],["NaCl, 150 mM","8.766 g"],["Triton X-100, 1%","10.0 ml"]],"guid":"D8F52BA82E8447A59714F7755BEC49E1","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["1% Triton X-100 Buffer:","Amount/Liter\n"],["Tris, 50 mM","6.057 g"],["NaCl, 150 mM","8.766 g"],["Triton X-100, 1%","10.0 ml"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23]}},"1":{"type":"ph","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"","id":0,"number":"7.4"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a9pod","text":"Prepare ice, sample tubes, PBS for washing cells, cell scrapers and a beaker for decanting media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3c1dc","text":"Decant media into a beaker and wash cells 3x with   of ice-cold PBS/150 mm dish, each time decanting into the beaker.  After the last wash aspirate off as much media as possible.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":50,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1p438","text":"Place cell culture dish  , add  /150 mm dish of 1% Triton X100 + dissolved protease inhibitors, scrape the cells off using a cell scraper and transfer the cell mixture into a chilled microcentrifuge tube.  If using several dishes, harvest one dish and then transfer the lysate to the next dishes to minimize the volume.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":24,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":31,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6khoq","text":"Spin lysates for  . Collect the supernatant and place in new chilled microcentrifuge tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":17,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"20000","duration":300,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"72orq","text":"Measure protein concentration using the NanoDrop or other spectrophotometer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6pbt8","text":"For immunoprecipitation, prepare the Chromotek GFP-TRAP agarose resin by aliquoting   of bead suspension per sample. Make sure that the beads are well resuspended before pipetting. To facilitate pipetting cut off the ends of the micropipette tips.   of unconjugated agarose beads can be added per sample to help with visualizing the bead pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":84,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":248,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cdffk","text":"Wash beads 3x with   lysis buffer.  For each wash invert tube up and down a few times, pellet the resin by centrifugation for   and carefully aspirate the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":19,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":126,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"10.000","duration":30,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f9umi","text":"After the last wash resuspend the resin in a small volume of lysis buffer and divide it equally between sample tubes.  Spin again and aspirate off excess lysis buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"etg64","text":"Transfer cell lysates into the tubes containing resin (use equal protein amounts for each sample typically ~   of 3-  lysate).  Save 10% of total cell lysate to use as a control during immunoblotting.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":109,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":116,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1524}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2b3j5","text":"Rotate immunoprecipitation samples end-over-end at   for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":51,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":57,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5kp0t","text":"At the end of the incubation centrifuge   to collect beads; aspirate most of supernatant using a vacuum and super fine tip, being careful not to disrupt the pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":40,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"10000","duration":30,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":-1,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1uvv6","text":"Wash pelleted beads 4-6x with lysis buffer (  for each wash).  For each wash, mix the suspension for ~ , spin down (~  pulse), and aspirate supernatant. To be safe, do not try to get all of it -- leave some (5%) buffer over the beads. Work quickly and keep samples cold.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":44,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":102,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":117,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":10,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"buj4h","text":"Using a fine pipette tip, remove remaining supernatant from the beads after last wash.  Place tubes back  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":105,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cuags","text":"Add   of 2X sample buffer to each tube of beads; vortex at ~1/2 speed, keeping beads in bottom of tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"890dt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"59ji7","text":"10 x Sample buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3msd1","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b2fnb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","5_0":"","5_1":"","A_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-bold"}},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["178","135"],"data":[["Chemical ","Amount/20 ml"],["0.5 M Tris pH 6.8","10 ml"],["10% SDS","2 g"],["50% Sucrose","10 g"],["0.04% Bromophenol Blue","8 mg"],["1.2 M Mercaptoethanol","2 ml"]],"guid":"A29C68E06DF54770A3A78C5FBECBC91C","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Chemical ","Amount/20 ml"],["0.5 M Tris pH 6.8","10 ml"],["10% SDS","2 g"],["50% Sucrose","10 g"],["0.04% Bromophenol Blue","8 mg"],["1.2 M Mercaptoethanol","2 ml"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}
